description: This class manages percentage values, allowing for setting, getting, and arithmetic operations and more.
name: Percent.gd

description: Helper tool for rendering plain GLSL shaders to a texture via RenderingDevice.
name: ShaderRenderTool.gd

description: A text box for editing a shader at runtime.
name: ShaderTextEdit.gd

description: This class reads Bits from a PackedByteArray. Its supposed to be used in conjunction with the BitWriter, which allows for custom data compression.
name: BitReader.gd

description: This class writes Bits to a PackedByteArray. Its supposed to be used in conjunction with the BitReader, which allows for custom data compression.
name: BitWriter.gd

description: Get global from a node and set it to a label, if target is null set self for target and if output label is null will create a label and use it. You can use it for send position from one to another node with create text variable for output node.
name: GlobalPosition.gd
